articles.title: Russian Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Russian Ambassador Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Alexandr Matsegora gave a reception at his embassy Monday to mark the 69th anniversary of the conclusion of the DPRK-Russia agreement on economic and cultural cooperation.
					 Present on invitation were Kim Yong Jae, minister of External Economic Relations and chairman of the DPRK side to the DPRK-Russia Inter-governmental Committee for Cooperation of Trade, Economy, Science and Technology, Sin Hong Chol, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is chairman of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Association, and officials concerned.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Health Foods for Children Developed
articles.content:
Health Foods for Children Developed
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The Research Institute for Nutrition Care of Children under the Institute of Medical Science in the DPRK has recently developed various kinds of natural health foods good for the growth and for taking care of nutrition of children.
					 Instant kidney bean nutritive powder, a health food made with kidney bean, raises protein value of ordinary meal for children, thus preventing delay in growth for lack of protein. 
					
					 Reuteri lactobacillus powder developed on the basis of deep research into constitution of children controls the action of pathogenic bacteria by propagating some kinds of useful bacteria like a lactobacillus living in the intestines, thus curing colitis and other diseases without use of antibiotic.
					
					 The institute also developed functional yogurt and vitamin D3 tablet good for the growth and prevention of rickets, lactobacillus nutritive pill and combined enzyme pill for the intestines and nutritive pill and nutritive thin gruel for improving nutritive conditions of body.

articles.title: DPRK Plans to Use Glauberite in Agricultural Sector
articles.content:
DPRK Plans to Use Glauberite in Agricultural Sector
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The DPRK is planning to widely use glauberite in agricultural sector. 
					 Due measures have been taken to use glauberite as natural mineral fertilizer and substitute fertilizer in co-op farms in the northwestern part of the country including Ryongchon County in North Phyongan Province.
					
					 The glauberite contains macro and micro indispensable elements like nitrogen, phosphorus, potassium, silicon, calcium, magnesium, sulfur, iron, manganese, zinc, copper and sodium and other beneficial elements and rare-earth elements.
					
					 It can be used in all paddy and non-paddy fields except paddy fields with high salt concentration, including tideland paddy fields.
					
					 Wide use of glauberite is of important significance in steadily increasing agricultural production.
					
					 According to survey data, hundreds of millions of tons of glauberite are deposited in the country.

articles.title: More Vigorous Socialist Emulation for Fresh Victory of Revolution Called for
articles.content:
More Vigorous Socialist Emulation for Fresh Victory of Revolution Called for
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday editorially calls for dynamically launching the socialist emulation to win a fresh victory of the revolution.
					 Noting that now the hostile forces' brutal sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK lay grave ordeals on the way of its advance, the editorial goes on:
					
					 For us to bravely overcome manifold hardships and difficulties and leap higher and faster is to actively launch the socialist emulation.
					
					 The degree of the socialist emulation is the speed of the grand Mallima march.
					
					 The more active the socialist emulation becomes, the higher the enthusiasm of the struggle becomes, and a great surge will be brought about in production and construction.
					
					 To help and lead each other forward and bring about the collective innovation is the nature and advantage of Korean- style socialism.
					
					 Vitality of the socialist emulation is to achieve the unity of the collective with one thought and purpose and give fullest play to the creative wisdom and enthusiasm of the masses.
					
					 The dynamic socialist emulation is the source of popular heroism and representation of the indomitable offensive spirit of our people to outpace the world.
					
					 When all the units and fields redouble their efforts and achieve fresh leaps and bring about joint innovations, the invincible spirit of - Korean-style socialism will be fully displayed.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Foiling Imperialists' Aggression and Interference
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Foiling Imperialists' Aggression and Interference
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- Today when the imperialists' moves to put other countries and nations under their control and dominate the world have become all the more crafty and vicious, it is a vital issue on which hinges the destiny of each country and nation to fight against aggression and interference in the internal affairs of other countries by the imperialists, says an article of Rodong Sinmun Monday.
					 The imperialists are citing all sorts of pretexts to dominate other countries and nations and to subjugate them, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 "Democracy", "human rights" and "war on terrorism" at present are sloganboards which the imperialists have always put up in their aggression and interference in the internal affairs of other countries.
					
					 The imperialists are trumpeting about "human rights" and "democracy" while giving impression that they are trying to realize justice. This is aimed to justify the aggression and interference in the internal affairs of other countries.
					
					 The "war on terrorism" committed by the U.S. is a state-sponsored terrorist act against anti-U.S. and independent countries and it is a revised version of undisguised interference in the internal affairs and aggression war moves.
					
					 It is the unanimous desire and wish of the world peace-loving people to live in the world without domination, subjugation, aggression and interference.
					
					 Those countries valuing sovereignty of the country and dignity of the nation should heighten vigilance against the imperialists' aggression and interference in the internal affairs and wage high-intensity struggle to thoroughly foil them.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative Forces Can Not Evade Stern Punishment by History: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative Forces Can Not Evade Stern Punishment by History: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday carries an article on the elapse of one year since worst traitor Park Geun Hye was impeached by the stern punishment of history in south Korea.
					 The impeachment and detention of traitor Park were an eruption of pent-up wrath and indignation of the public against her and the conservative forces which enforced unprecedented unpopular rule and committed acts of flunkeyism and treachery and heinous moves for escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen by defying the public mindset and challenging the desire of the nation, and was stern punishment by history, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The Park regime, den of evil, was finally sternly punished by history and came to an end. This proved that the traitorous forces going against the desire of the public and the trend of the times are bound to ruin and nothing can quench the desire of the popular masses for justice.
					
					 The conservative forcers including the "Liberal Korea Party" which have resorted to all sorts of evils while living in luxury with the support of the conservative regime are a group of accomplices that have to be buried in the grave of history together with traitors Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye.
					
					 However, the "Liberal Korea Party" and other conservative forces are desperately trying to check the trend of the times toward national unity and reunification while defending traitor Park.
					
					 The conservative forces' wild act to get rid of the abyss of ruin is an intolerable insult to the candlelight demonstrators of south Korea and a shame on the nation.
					
					 The situation proves that the south Korean conservative forces are group of evils and detestable political philistines deceiving the public and dreaming of reviving the fascist dark age, without even an iota of guilty conscience.

articles.title: Meeting of Korean Youth League in Japan Held
articles.content:
Meeting of Korean Youth League in Japan Held
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The 5th Meeting of the 23rd Central Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan was held at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on Mar. 12.
					 Among those present were Han Tong Song, director of the Organizational Department of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), Kim Yong Ju, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, and members of the Central Committee of the league.
					
					 Chairman Kim Yong Ju made a report at the meeting.
					
					 The reporter said that the league has made precious successes in consolidating itself into an organization loved by the compatriots and trusted and relied on by the youth and students through an offensive mass movement.
					
					 He stressed the need to intensify the movement with the branches of the league as a main force up to the forthcoming its 24th Congress as required by the mass drive which is waged in an organized way in hearty response to the New Year Address and New Year message of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The congress will be a historic one through which to provide a new milestone in the Korean youth movement in Japan in the great Kim Jong Un's era, the reporter said, and called for glorifying the congress of the league, as well as the 24th Congress of Chongryon, as a congress of glory and loyalty and a congress of victory and unity.
					
					 Then speeches were made.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was read out at the meeting.

articles.title: Executive Committee Meetings of Chongryon Headquarters Take Place
articles.content:
Executive Committee Meetings of Chongryon Headquarters Take Place
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- Meetings of executive committees of headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) took place in different parts of Japan from March 8 to 13 to carry out the decision of the 5th Meeting of the 23rd Central Committee of Chongryon true to the letter respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un sent to Chongryon and Koreans in Japan on the 60th anniversary of its formation.
					 The meetings discussed tasks and measures to glorify the 24th Congress of Chongryon as the one of glory and loyalty and more vigorously launch with branches as the center the drive for making a decisive breakthrough for the patriotic movement and adopted the relevant decision.
					
					 The 5th Meeting of the 23rd Executive Committee of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon was held in Tokyo on March 10.
					
					 Jo Il Yon, chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon, and other executive members took part in the meeting.
					
					 Jo Il Yon in his report said that Chongryon conducted a 100-day campaign and a 90-day campaign according to the decision of the Chongryon Central Committee under the leadership of Kim Jong Un last year despite the strained situation and it is vigorously launching the drive for strengthening Chongryon branches this year.
					
					 He appealed to all Koreans in Japan to bear in mind the absolute trust in Kim Jong Un and pride and honor of having the motherland and intensify the struggle for bringing earlier the final victory under whatever situation.
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					 The meeting decided to hold the 24th Congress of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon on June 10 at the Korean Hall of Culture in Tokyo.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was read out at the meeting.

articles.title: 60th Graduation Ceremony of Chongryon Korean University Held
articles.content:
60th Graduation Ceremony of Chongryon Korean University Held
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The 60th graduation ceremony of the Korean University of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) took place at the university in Tokyo on March 11.
					 Present there were Chairman Ho Jong Man and Vice-Chairman Pae Ik Ju of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, Kang Chu Ryon, vice-chairwoman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee and chairwoman of the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Democratic Korean Women in Japan, Song Kun Hak, director of the Education Department of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, President Jang Pyong Thae and deans of the university, principals of Korean high schools across Japan, leading officials of organizations and enterprises under the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, graduates of the university, their parents, staff members and students of the university, and other Koreans in Japan.
					
					 Congratulatory messages from the Education Commission of the DPRK and universities in the homeland including Kim Il Sung University were introduced at the ceremony.
					
					 Chairman Ho Jong Man made a congratulatory speech.
					
					 He said the Korean University is the only university of overseas compatriots in the world which holds the peerlessly great men as its tender-hearted teachers and a glorious one which develops as required by the present era when the cause of Juche and the movement of Koreans in Japan have entered a new historic stage under the warm loving care of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He expressed belief that the graduates would do their bit in the patriotic work as befitting reliable successors to the movement of Koreans in Japan remaining loyal to the guidance of the Supreme Leader.
					
					 Jang Pyong Thae made a report.
					
					 Citations of the DPRK Education Commission, the Chongryon Central Standing Committee and the Korean University were awarded to graduates.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was read out.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony there was an art performance of graduates.

articles.title: Japanese Government Urged to Punish Criminals of Shooting Case
articles.content:
Japanese Government Urged to Punish Criminals of Shooting Case
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- An inquiry group of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on March 12 urged the Japanese government to probe into the truth behind the case of firing at the Chongryon Central Hall committed by the Japanese right-wing reactionaries, prevent recurrence of such case and withdraw discriminative rules against Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.
					 The inquiry group consisting of Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, the department director for Rights and Welfare of Chongryon and representatives of the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Democratic Korean Women in Japan and the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon went to the Cabinet Office in Tokyo and met officials of the Cabinet Secretariat, the National Police Agency and the Ministry of Justice.
					
					 The group handed over a letter of request, adopted at the emergency meeting of Koreans in Japan condemning the Japanese right-wing reactionaries for firing at the Chongryon Central Hall on Feb. 28, to the Japanese government.
					
					 Nam Sung U said that the reckless shooting case against Chongryon was an unpardonable crime.
					
					 The Japanese government's persistent sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK and political suppression of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan sparked off the shooting case, he stressed.
					
					 He urged the Japanese government to withdraw its hostile policy toward the DPRK as early as possible and give up at once the steps of politically suppressing and controlling legitimate and fair activities of Chongryon.
					
					 Kiyohiko Toyama, member of the House of Representatives and chairman of the International Affairs of the New Komeito Party of Japan, accompanying the inquiry group, contended that the Japanese government should accept the demand of Chongryon and take a responsible measure.

articles.title: Brief Biography of Kim Il Sung Introduced by DR Congolese Organization
articles.content:
Brief Biography of Kim Il Sung Introduced by DR Congolese Organization
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The brief biography of President Kim Il Sung was posted by the DR Congolese preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of the President, on the internet homepage of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of the DR Congo on March 14 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 Posted on the homepage was a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Russia
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee comprising Russian organizations for the study of the Juche idea was formed on March 11 to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Dmitri Kostenko, chairman of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events such as a celebration meeting and seminar to praise the revolutionary career and immortal exploits of Kim Il Sung on the occasion of his birth anniversary, the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Desarrollados alimentos salubres para crecimiento de ninos
articles.content:
Desarrollados alimentos salubres para crecimiento de ninos
Pyongyang, 19 de marzo (ACNC) -- La Academia de Ciencias Medicas acabo de desarrollar los alimentos naturales salubres para el crecimiento y la administracion nutritiva de los ninos.
					La harina nutritiva instantanea de frijol posibilita evitar el retraso de crecimiento de los ninos causado por falta de la proteina.
					
					La harina de bacterias lacticas Reuteri retiene la funcion de los germenes patogenicos al multiplicar varias bacterias utiles como las lacticas que habitan normalmente en el intestino. De esta manera, puede tratar la inflamacion del intestino grueso sin emplear los antibioticos.
					
					Ademas, la academia desarrollo el yogurt funcional y la pastilla de vitamina D3 recomendables para el crecimiento de estatura y la prevencion de raquitismo, la pastilla de bacteria lactica y las gachas nutritivas que posibilitan mejorar el estado nutritivo del cuerpo humano, etc.

articles.title: Se utilizara ampliamente la glauberita en el sector agricola
articles.content:
Se utilizara ampliamente la glauberita en el sector agricola
Pyongyang, 19 de marzo (ACNC) -- En las granjas cooperativas del distrito de Ryongchon de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte y otras zonas occidentales se toman las medidas para utilizar la glauberita como abono mineral natural y fertilizante substitutivo.
					El mineral contiene nitrogenos, fosforo, silicio, calcio, magnesio, azufre, hierro, manganeso, zinc, cobre, sodio y otros macroelementos y microelementos indispensables, las sustancias utiles y los lantanidos.
					
					Es recomendable para todos los arrozales y parcelas, excepto los arrozales con alta salinidad.
					
					Su uso amplio tiene gran importancia para aumentar sin cesar la produccion agricola.
					
					Segun las prospecciones, yacen en nuestro pais cientos de millones de toneladas de glauberita.

articles.title: Debe frustrar agresion e intervencion de imperialistas, destaca Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Debe frustrar agresion e intervencion de imperialistas, destaca Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 19 de marzo (ACNC) -- Hoy en que se tornan mas astutas y perversas las maniobras de los imperialistas de dominar a otros paises y naciones y tomar la heguemonia del mundo, se presenta la lucha contra la agresion de los imperialistas y sus intervenciones en los asuntos internos como problema vital que decide el destino de cada pais y cada nacion.
					 Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual del dia 19 y prosigue:
					
					 Los imperialistas se valen de todos para dominar y subyugar a otros paises y naciones.
					
					  Hoy en dia, la "democracia", los "derechos humanos" y la "guerra antiterrorista" son los rotulos rutinarios que se usan por los imperialistas para agredir a otros paises y entremeterse en los asuntos internos.
					
					  Para justificar sus intenciones, ellos actuan como si se esforzaran por la justicia, hablando ruidosamente de los "DDHH" y la "democracia".
					
					  La "guerra antiterrorista" de EE.UU. deviene el terrorismo estatal contra otros paises y el nuevo tipo de entremetimiento y guerra agresiva abiertos.
					
					  Los pueblos pacifistas demandan vivir en un mundo libre de la dominacion y subyugacion, la agresion y la intervencion.
					
					  Los paises que aprecian la soberania del pais y la dignidad de la nacion deben redoblar la vigilancia sobre la agresion y la intervencion de los imperialistas y hacerles frente rotundo.

articles.title: Conservadores surcoreanos no pueden evitar el castigo severo, apunta Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Conservadores surcoreanos no pueden evitar el castigo severo, apunta Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 19 de marzo (ACNC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun divulgo el dia 19 un articulo individual en relacion con que se cumple un ano desde la dimision de la traidora surcoreana Park Geun-hye por la severa sentencia de la historia.
					La dimision y la detencion de Park fueron la explosion del arraigado rencor y la colera de la poblacion y el serio juicio de la historia sobre la traidora y la banda conservadora que al navegar a contrapelo de la opinion publica y a la aspiracion de la nacion, vinieron recurriendo a la politica antipopular, los actos vendepatrias y serviles a grandes potencias y la confrontacion fratricida. 
					
					Asi inicia el articulo y continua:
					
					El derrumbe del "poder" de Park Geun-hye, nido de males, demostro que se arruinaran sin falta las fuerzas traidoras que marchan a contrapelo de la opinion publica y la corriente de la epoca y que nadie puede impedir el deseo de las masas populares por la justicia.
					
					El Partido de Corea Libre y otros compinches conservadores que cometieron todo tipo de maldades disfrutando de la opulencia y placeres bajo el amparo del "poder" conservador son los complices a ser sepultados en la tumba de la historia junto con los traidores Lee Myung Bak y Park Geun-hye.
					
					Sin embargo, los conservadores surcoreanos se desesperan todavia por frenar la corriente de la epoca hacia la unidad nacional y la reunificacion, abrigando a la traidora.
					
					Sus tentativas ultimas para salir del abismo de arruinamiento devienen la burla intolerable a la poblacion surcoreana levantada con velas encendidas y la verguenza de la nacion.
					
					La realidad muestra que la banda conservadora surcoreana es el grupo de males y politicastros que en lugar de sentir la culpabilidad, solo suenan por resucitar la era fascista enganando y burlando a la opinion publica.
